item.ftbfiltersystem.smart_filter.toolti: Sneak + Right-click: Test with item in off-hand
ftbfiltersystem.message.not_a_filter: You must hold a Smart Filter in your main hand
ftbfiltersystem.message.not_configured: This Smart Filter has no active configuration
ftbfiltersystem.message.no_offhand_item: Hold an item in your off-hand to test
filter.ftbfiltersystem.and.name: All Of
filter.ftbfiltersystem.and.tooltip: Compound filter: matches only if ALL child filters match.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.or.name: Any Of
filter.ftbfiltersystem.or.tooltip: Compound filter: matches if ANY child filter matches.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.not.name: Not
filter.ftbfiltersystem.not.tooltip:
Compound filter: matches only if the child filter does NOT match.
Only one child is allowed.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.only_one.name: Only One Of
filter.ftbfiltersystem.only_one.tooltip: Compound filter: matches only if EXACTLY ONE child filter matches.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.block.name: Is Block
filter.ftbfiltersystem.block.tooltip: Simple filter that matches placeable block items.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.component.name: Item Component
filter.ftbfiltersystem.component.tooltip:
Matches items based on data components.
Supports exact or fuzzy matching.
Admins can copy component data into the editor by clicking items with components in inventory. Data is serialized as SNBT.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.durability.name: Durability
filter.ftbfiltersystem.durability.toolti:
Matches items by remaining durability.
Non-damageable items count as 0 durability.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.food_value.name: Food Value
filter.ftbfiltersystem.food_value.toolti:
Matches items based on food value (half-shanks).
Non-food items have a value of 0.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item.name: Item
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item.tooltip:
Matches specific items.
Does not check component data (use 'Component Filter' for that).
Select items from Creative or Inventory lists.
Use the text field to filter by item ID.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item_tag.name: Item Tag
filter.ftbfiltersystem.item_tag.tooltip:
Matches items by tag.
Use the text field to filter available tags.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.stack_size.name: Stack Size
filter.ftbfiltersystem.stack_size.toolti: Matches items by current stack size.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.max_stack_size.to:
Matches items by maximum stack size.
Unstackable items have a max size of 1.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.mod.name: Mod
filter.ftbfiltersystem.mod.tooltip:
Matches the mod that adds the item.
Vanilla items are in the 'minecraft' namespace.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.custom.name: Custom
filter.ftbfiltersystem.custom.tooltip:
Advanced filter for modpack developers.
Triggers a CustomFilterEvent during checks. The result defines success/failure.
Enter freeform text as event data in the text field.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.expression.name: Expression
filter.ftbfiltersystem.expression.toolti:
Enter or load literal filter expressions from a Filter item.
Assigning a custom name is optional, but helps readability.
filter.ftbfiltersystem.root.name: Root (All Of)
